workshoptitle: Load and Analyze Your Data with Autonomous Database

tutorials.title: Lab 1 (optional): Review How to Provision an Analytics Cloud Instance
tutorials.description: Provision Oracle Analytics Cloud. You will use this instance when creating dashboards at the end of this workshop.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Load Data from Object Storage Public Buckets
tutorials.description: Load customer contact, movie genre, customer sales and pizza location data into ADB from public object storage buckets using the Database Tools

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Load Data from Local Files
tutorials.description: Load additional customer details into ADB from local files using the Database Actions tools

tutorials.title: Lab 5 (optional): Review How to Develop Self-Service Analytics Cloud Dashboards
tutorials.description: Use Analytics Cloud for interactive dashboards

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Load Data from Object Storage Private Buckets
tutorials.description: Load additional customer details into ADB from private object storage buckets using the Database Actions tools

tutorials.title: Lab 7 (optional): Load and Analyze JSON Data
tutorials.description: Load JSON collections about movies using the DBMS_CLOUD package and analyze that data using SQL

tutorials.title: Lab 8 (optional): Load and Analyze the News from REST Endpoints
tutorials.description: Load news and analyze the sentiment about actors from the newsapi.org

tutorials.title: Lab 9 (optional): Create Data Pipelines for Continuous Data Import and Export
tutorials.description: Create Oracle Data Pipelines for continuous data import and export

tutorials.title: Lab 10 (optional): Use AutoML to Predict Customer Churn
tutorials.description: Create a Machine Learning model using AutoML UI to Predict Churn

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
